properties.name: mesh.address
properties.description: The consumer address if want direct invoke any node network services.

properties.name: mesh.runtime
properties.description: The consumer has been invoked address if want direct invoke any node network services.

properties.name: mesh.mode
properties.description: Mesh run mode, like enable/failfast etc.

properties.name: mesh.direct
properties.description: The mesh invoke direct address, like mesh.net.version=127.0.0.1:570.

properties.name: mesh.zone
properties.description: The mesh logic deployment zone in[00,99].

properties.name: mesh.cluster
properties.description: The mesh logic deployment cluster in[00,99].

properties.name: mesh.cell
properties.description: The mesh logic deployment cell in[00,99].

properties.name: mesh.group
properties.description: The mesh logic deployment group in[00,99].

properties.name: mesh.feature
properties.description: The mesh feature setting, like mpi-name-prefix:timeout@optional(inst or node id),=10000.
